speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: And all this time [she/he/they] were sick…you had no idea, did you?

speaker: Alma
dialogue: You have to get to the hospital! You have to meet {Madeline/James/Riley}!

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: Not to worry, I have just the trick to get you to the hospital quickly…here, jump in my palm.

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: While you were cutting out those holiday cards, I had a trick up my sleeve.

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: Behold! My finest cutout creation, Cap’n Cutouts’ Cardstock Craft!

speaker: Alma
dialogue: Just take ahold of the wheel here and…

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: Say hello to your friend for us!

speaker: Alma
dialogue: …honey, do you think that [] will be okay?

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: So long as they have their heart as their compass, I think everything will turn out just fine.
